events.message: The client reported an accident involving their car hitting a guardrail on the highway during heavy rain.
Claim was reviewed and categorised under Auto Accident as it involved vehicle collision damage.
An agent specializing in vehicle accident claims was assigned to handle this particular case.
The insured was notified that their claim has been acknowledged and is now being processed.
The client was asked to submit photos of the damaged vehicle and police accident report for review.
All requested documents including vehicle photos and accident report were successfully submitted by the client.
An investigation was initiated to verify the accident details and assess the extent of vehicle damage.
The investigation concluded with confirmation of the accident circumstances matching the claim description.
The insurance company proposed a settlement amount based on the damage assessment and policy coverage.
The client responded positively, expressing satisfaction with the proposed settlement offer and service.
The claim was formally approved following agreement on the settlement terms with the insured party.
Settlement payment was issued to the clientâ€™s account on the agreed date without any delays.
The claim case was officially closed after payment confirmation and receipt acknowledgment from client.
All documents and case files for this auto accident claim were archived for future reference.
